sentences.sentence: Sunbird Taxi Service here. Can I help you?
sentences.translation: 我是太阳鸟出租车公司。能为你帮忙吗？

sentences.sentence: Sunbird passes on from generation to generation beautiful fable.
sentences.translation: 一个世代相传的美丽传说。

sentences.sentence: Sunbird can't write this to the ICS file and will loose the setting after restart.
sentences.translation: Sunbird不能够将这些写入ICS文件，重启之后便会失效。
